title: Fish curry with watercress and lemon couscous
description: An ideal fish for this curry is tilapia, a freshwater fish that is cheap to buy, easy to prepare and has a mild taste.
ingredients: 700g/1lb 9oz skinless tilapia or white fish fillets, defrosted if frozen, cut into large chunks
1 small onion, peeled and finely chopped
1 small green chilli, finely chopped (deseeded if you want less heat)
large handful pea shoots or micro herbs, to garnish
